english.segment1: Verse 1: When I look in your eyes. I see a whole different sky. Like I've never seen before. And when I hear your voice. It's like a song that I can. Listen to o', over again
english.segment2: Pre-chorus 1: It's so crazy how you make me go crazy. Every time that I'm near you
english.segment3: Chorus 1: Cause you're just a dream. This is my reality. Totally insanity. If I could be in your dream. All I wanna do is be with you be with you. You're just a dream. Just a dream
english.segment4: Verse 2: When I picture the world. It takes me to the sun. I think about the way you smile. And the words that you say. Always seem to change. The world that I've been living in
english.segment5: Pre-chorus 2: It's so crazy how you make me go crazy. Every time that I'm near you
english.segment6: Chorus: Cause you're just a dream. This is my reality. Totally insanity. If I could be in your dream. All I wanna do is be with you be with you. You're just a dream. Just a dream. You're just a dream. Just a dream yeah
english.segment7: Bridge: More than my imagination could ever see. You're just a dream. If I could be with you
english.segment8: Chorus: You're just a dream. This is my reality. Totally insanity. If I could be in your dream. All I wanna do is be with you be with you. Cause You're just a dream. This is my reality. Totally insanity. If I could be in your dream. All I wanna do is be with you be with you. Be with you. You're just a dream. Oh whoa you're just a dream. Just a dream.
